summary: Validated 9 validation plans containing 33 total checks across navigation paths, override indicators, content presence, UI states, and options. All plans passed logical validation. Feature covers daily wage calculation configuration in Leave Policies, Payroll settings, and End of Service eligibility with appropriate override mechanisms and calculation method options.
